Machinate {2}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell with no targets for its machinate cost. If you do, create a 1/1 Puppet, then attach this to it.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.” As long as it's a Puppet, it gets +3/+3 and has flying.
